Santa_Cruz.Pacific Collegiate School:
Pacific Collegiate School is a grades 7-12 charter school located on the westside of Santa Cruz, California.


== The Founding of Pacific Collegiate School ==
Over a period of about twenty years, beginning in the 1970s, a group of parents and teachers in Santa Cruz, California, often met to discuss educational reform. They envisioned schools which inspire students to learn through an integrated curriculum, leading to a high level of intellectual and artistic achievement.
